```{r, data}
library(tidyverse)
library(GGally)

seedling_all <- read_csv("../data/seedling_for_drought.csv")
wp <- read_csv("../data/wp.csv")

colnames(seedling_all)
colnames(wp)

tmp10 <- seedling_all %>% 
  group_by(sp) %>%
  summarize(n = n()) %>%
  filter(n >= 10)
```
